refnamediv.refpurpose: the Vovida Open Communication and Application Library

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The Vovida Open Communication and Application Library is an open source SIP proxy, registrar, and feature service platform. It includes a number of servers which are tightly integrated and which can provide SIP call control, routing, and SIP features, such as call forwarding and voice mail.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: More information is available from http://www.vovida.org/
